settings.name: Filter by Time Interval (minutes)
settings.description: The length of interval, in minutes, to which to filter data. Must be between 0 and 60. Leave blank for no filtering.

settings.name: Upper threshold for movement speed (kmph)
settings.description: The highest acceptable movement speed for all IDs (units: km/h). Any location with a speed exceeding this value will be removed as an outlier.

settings.name: Bind additional timestamp columns
settings.description: Determines whether to append specific timestamp data (*hour,* *minute,* *second,* *hourmin,* and *yearmonthday*) to the output.

settings.name: Bind speed column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a 'speed' column (units: km/h).

settings.name: Bind distance travelled column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a 'distance travelled' column (units: metres).

settings.name: Bind UTM location data
settings.description: Determines whether to generate and append Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM) data to the output. If TRUE, the primary geometry will become UTM data. NOTE: This will also remove points without any attached geometry.

settings.name: Provide EPSG code for UTM coordinates
settings.description: If *Bind UTM location data* is selected, please provide a valid EPSG code for the transformed coordinate system. Defaults to EPSG:32733 (UTM zone 33S)

settings.name: Bind 'time difference' column
settings.description: Determines whether or not to bind a 'time difference' column (units: hours).

settings.name: Name of 'primary animal identifier' column
settings.description: Insert the name of the column to be used as primary identification. If no column is named, the default identifier column as used in Movebank remains the primary identifier.

settings.name: Name of altitude column
settings.description: The name of the column containing altitude data (if any). The column must already be contained within the input dataset. Leaving blank generates an empty altitude column.

settings.name: Name of temperature column
settings.description: The name of the column containing temperature data (if any). The column must already be contained within the input dataset. Leaving this empty generates an empty temperature column.

settings.name: Name of heading column
settings.description: The name of the column containing heading data (if any). The column must already be contained within the input dataset. Leaving this empty generates an empty heading column.

settings.name: Keep only essential columns
settings.description: If TRUE, the output data contains only the following columns (but not all, depending on which settings above are used): *temperature*, *heading*, *altitude*, *import_marked_outlier*, *index*, *hour*, *min*, *secs*, *hourmin*, *yearmonthday*, *gap_mins*, *kmph*, *dist_m*, *x (UTM)*, *y (UTM)*, *geometry (sf)*, *lon*, *lat*, *study*.
